body_html: @fesun Maybe a small reproducing script would help us to identify the problem. As you mentioned, if changing the three constants to very small numbers in ENQUEUE_REQUEST could reproduce the issue in a smaller scale (2~3 nodes), I am glad to run a customized build locally and see if I could reproduce that. Problem is I don't have a Windows box, so I am not sure if it works.

body: @fesun Maybe a small reproducing script would help us to identify the problem. As you mentioned, if changing the three constants to very small numbers in `ENQUEUE_REQUEST` could reproduce the issue in a smaller scale (2~3 nodes), I am glad to run a customized build locally and see if I could reproduce that. Problem is I don't have a Windows box, so I am not sure if it works.
